0000110100011101 0110001000100101 1 -> sum: 0110111101000011, cout: 0
0101011011100010 0001000011000100 0 -> sum: 0110011110100110, cout: 0
0101110101110111 0010101010001000 1 -> sum: 1000100000000000, cout: 0
1010100101010101 1111001011001101 1 -> sum: 1001110000100011, cout: 1
0001101001101001 1010011110010001 0 -> sum: 1100000111111010, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
